result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.orig: ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu

result.eng: Some ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhrac
result.orig: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhrac
result.html: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i nua-eaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: "Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ga: amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.orig: amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.html: amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ponchtml: amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall manhattan agus a ċuaiġ róċóngaraċ don ḟoirgneaṁ a ẛíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú meán foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.

result.eng: Indeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.

result.html: go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seachtIndeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
